name: Ginsights
description: All Goal: Achieve, Earn, Celebrate. All Goal is the premier Achieve-to-Earn platform, designed to motivate and reward users for reaching personal milestones. Set goals, track progress, and earn tokens in a supportive community. Dive into All Goal and transform your aspirations into tangible rewards.

params.title: Share Goal
params.text: Share Your goal with your friends

shortcuts.name: All Goal
shortcuts.url: The url you would like to open when the user chooses this shortcut. This must be a URL local to your PWA. For example: If my start_url is /, this URL must be something like /shortcut
